file.name: antifraud.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: API
  description: API de pagos con tarjeta
  version: 0.1.9

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/risk-assessment-service/

paths:

  "/evaluate-payment-intent":
    post:
      description: Evalua la intención de pago y devuelve una respuesta positiva o negativa para proseguir con la transacción, según el score de riesgo
      operationId: evaluatePaymentIntent
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/PaymentIntentForRiskAssessmentBody"
        
      responses:
        200:
          description: Éxito
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/RiskAssessmentResponse"

        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"

components:
  schemas:
  
    PaymentIntentForRiskAssessment:
      type: object
      required:
        - transactionId
        - token
        - amount
      properties:
        transactionId:
          type: string
        token:
          type: string
        amount:
          type: integer
   
    RiskAssessmentResponse:
      required:
        - success
        - date
        - transactionId
        - status
        - riskScore
      properties:
        success:
          type: string
        date:
          type: string
        transactionId:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          description: "Estado de la respuesta, si procede o no el pago"
          default: "antifraud:continue"
        riskScore:
          type: string
          description: "Score de riesgo, del 0 (nada) al 10 (mucho)"
          default: 0
  
    ErrorResponse:
      required:
        - message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

  requestBodies:
  
    PaymentIntentForRiskAssessmentBody:
      description: Intento de pago para evaluación de riesgo
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentIntentForRiskAssessment'

Error: parse: paths: /evaluate-payment-intent: post: operation "evaluatePaymentIntent": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/RiskAssessmentResponse": parse schema: riskScore: parse default: expected type "string", got "number"
